title: PowerGraph: A power grid benchmark dataset for graph neural networks
abstract: Public Graph Neural Networks (GNN) benchmark datasets facilitate the use of GNN and enhance GNN applicability to diverse disciplines. The community currently lacks public datasets of electrical power grids for GNN applications. Indeed, GNNs can potentially capture complex power grid phenomena over alternative machine learning techniques. Power grids are complex engineered networks that are naturally amenable to graph representations. Therefore, GNN have the potential for capturing the behavior of power grids over alternative machine learning techniques. To this aim, we develop a graph dataset for cascading failure events, which are the major cause of blackouts in electric power grids. Historical blackout datasets are scarce and incomplete. The assessment of vulnerability and the identification of critical components are usually conducted via computationally expensive offline simulations of cascading failures. Instead, we propose using machine learning models for the online detection of

Abstract: Public Graph Neural Networks (GNN) benchmark datasets facilitate the use of GNN and enhance GNN applicability to diverse disciplines. translated_title: PowerGraph: 用于图神经网络的电网基准数据集
translated_abstract: 公共图神经网络（GNN）基准数据集有助于使用GNN，并增强GNN在各个领域中的适用性。目前，社区中缺乏用于GNN应用的电力网格公共数据集。事实上，与其他机器学习技术相比，GNN可以潜在地捕捉到复杂的电力网格现象。电力网格是复杂的工程网络，天然适合于图表示。因此，GNN有潜力捕捉到电力网格的行为，而不用其他机器学习技术。为了实现这个目标，我们开发了一个用于级联故障事件的图数据集，这是导致电力网格断电的主要原因。历史断电数据集稀缺且不完整。通常通过计算昂贵的离线级联故障模拟来评估脆弱性和识别关键组件。相反，我们建议使用机器学习模型进行在线检测。
tldr: PowerGraph是一个用于图神经网络的电网基准数据集，旨在通过机器学习模型实现电力网格断电的在线检测。
